description.displayText: Brenda has been watching my toddler son since he was an infant.  She is a warm and trustworthy babysitter, who has been a wonderful addition to our family.  My son adores spending time with her.  He especially loves it when she cooks.  When they spend time together, Brenda texts photos to keep me in the loop.  Sometimes her son comes with her, and it's extra fun because it means my son has a "big boy" to play with.  Brenda also knows CPR, is bilingual, and has a car.
